评论详情: Usually you get what you pay for, but in this instance, you're getting a heckuva deal! These Johnny Deppp / m0$cot clones are made with a nice set of evenly built frames that firmly hold the very clear and non-distored purple lenses. Have a classic fedora and a penchant for setting your own casual vibe, rock n roll infused style trends? These are just the ticket. They're comfortable on my head (wearing a 7 3/8 size hat and a rather round-ish face). I've gotten many compliments and inquiries as to where I found these shades. My wife likes them on me, and that's the best recommendation I can get to keep wearing them, whether in a truly informal setting, or a more business-casual environment. I do plan to buy at least one more pair in a different lens &frame combo, to keep the variety fresh!
